title: Komatta Jiisan
alternative_title: Troublesome Old Man, Komatta Jii-san, 困ったじいさん
description: The comedy centers on an old man who pulls stereotypical ikemen (handsome man) actions on similarly old women and makes their hearts flutter.
genre: [<Genre -> Adventure>, <Genre -> Comedy>, <Genre -> Drama>, <Genre -> Romance>, <Genre -> Seinen>, <Genre -> Slice of Life>]
